The correct share for each person would be 12.00 / 2 = 6.00.

If x > 6.00, then I need to send back the difference (x - 6.00) to my friend.

I can see that my friend sent me 10.0 on '2022-03-07'. Now I need to calculate the amount they overpaid and send it back.
